New Records: Jamaica scored their first-ever Copa America goal in their eighth match in the tournament.
Key Match Events: Ecuador went ahead in the 13th minute via a Jamaica own goal.
Kendry Paez scored a penalty kick just before the interval after a handball by Gregory Leigh.
Alan Minda scored in the 91st minute with a goal from a classic counter-attack.
Michail Antonio scored Jamaica's first-ever Copa America goal shortly after halftime.
Referee Cristian Garay checked for a possible handball by Alan Franco in the 73rd minute but decided not to award a penalty.
